snippet: Elizabeth A. Duke, the seventh woman to serve on the Federal Reserve’s board, has focused primarily on financial regulation since joining in August 2008.
abstract: Elizabeth A Duke, Federal Reserve governor who has helped to overhaul group's approach to financial regulation, announces that she will step down in August 2013; Duke, only seventh woman to serve on board, has been quiet but consistent supporter of chairman Ben S Bernanke.
lead_paragraph: Elizabeth A. Duke, the seventh woman to serve on the Federal Reserve’s board, has focused primarily on financial regulation since joining in August 2008.

headline.main: Elizabeth Duke, Fed Governor, Plans to Step Down
headline.print_headline: Elizabeth Duke, Fed Governor, Plans to Step Down
